abstract: Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein, United Nations high commissioner for human rights, calls on China to immediately release group of detained human rights lawyers, noting concern over 'very worrying pattern' of arrests and disappearances since crackdown began in July 2015.
lead_paragraph: Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein, the high commissioner for human rights, expressed concern over a “very worrying pattern” of arrests and disappearances.

headline.main: U.N. Rights Official Urges China to Release Detained Lawyers
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | United Nations; Human Rights Official Asks China to Release Group of Detained Lawyers

snippet: Zeid Ra’ad al-Hussein, the high commissioner for human rights, expressed concern over a “very worrying pattern” of arrests and disappearances.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
